statements: UPDATE player_progress SET progress_percentage = 50.0, total_playtime = '2 hours' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE player_achievements SET unlocked = true, completion_date = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE player_id = '456e89b7-12d3-1234-4266-14174000e89b' AND game_id = '789e89b7-12d3-1234-4266-14174000e89b';
UPDATE player_progress SET level = level + 1, experience = experience + 100 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
